Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Link! I am incredibly grateful for your help
in the battle. On behalf of all the Gerudo,
thank you.
I suspect the Gibdo threat will calm down
a bit now that we've wiped out the hives
that were surrounding the town.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I noticed that the hives crumbled into
sand when we destroyed them...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>I wonder if the Gibdos have some kind of
connection to the sand?

Or maybe... <sp:5:0:0>Maybe they're connected to
the sand shroud? Did they make it? Did it
summon them?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>It is my duty to let you know that you are
underdressed at the moment.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>It would be better if you put on some
more clothing before you head into
the shelter.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Angry_00>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0>


And then there's the voice that you and I
both heard.

A voice and lightning... This reminds me
of something!

<snd:Understand_01>Link, there's something you should see.
Come down to the <clr:0000>mural in the
underground shelter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>It is my duty to let you know that the
attire you are wearing is...unacceptable.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Yiga have been our enemies for some
time, and it would be inappropriate to
walk around our town dressed as one.
